name: ICAIR 2018 : 2018 3rd International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Robotics
content: ●Publication and Indexing All the registered and presented papers of ICAIR 2018 will be included in the conference proceeding which is published in the volume of conference proceeding , which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, SCOPUS, Inspec, Conference Proceedings Citation Index – Science (CPCI-S)(Thomson Reuters, Web of Science) and other databases.
